argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnaddablo | |- + e. AbelOp |
| 2 |  | #P_ablogrpo | |- ( + e. AbelOp -> + e. GrpOp ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- + e. GrpOp |
| 4 |  | #P_axaddf | |- + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fdmi | |- dom + = ( CC X. CC ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_grporn | |- CC = ran + |
| 7 |  | #P_cnid | |- 0 = ( GId ` + ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` + ) = ( inv ` + ) |
| 9 |  | #P_zsscn | |- ZZ C_ CC |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( + |` ( ZZ X. ZZ ) ) = ( + |` ( ZZ X. ZZ ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_zaddcl | |- ( ( x e. ZZ /\ y e. ZZ ) -> ( x + y ) e. ZZ ) |
| 12 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 13 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( x e. ZZ -> x e. CC ) |
| 14 |  | #P_addinv | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( inv ` + ) ` x ) = -u x ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( x e. ZZ -> ( ( inv ` + ) ` x ) = -u x ) |
| 16 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( x e. ZZ -> -u x e. ZZ ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( x e. ZZ -> ( ( inv ` + ) ` x ) e. ZZ ) |
| 18 | 3, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 17 | #P_issubgoi | |- ( + |` ( ZZ X. ZZ ) ) e. ( SubGrpOp ` + ) |
